description:
Special Episode featuring different scenes from other http://anidb.net/cr23535 [Orcsoft] releases.
In order of appearance those are: 
* http://anidb.net/a7988 [Aisai Nikki]
* http://anidb.net/a8463 [Buta Hime-sama]
* http://anidb.net/a10004 [Kagachi-sama Onagusame Tatematsurimasu: Netorare Mura Inya Hanashi]
* http://anidb.net/a9492 [Miboujin Nikki The Animation: Akogare no Ano Hito to Hitotsu Yane no Shita]
* http://anidb.net/a9533 [Sei Yariman Gakuen Enkou Nikki The Animation]
* http://anidb.net/a10534 [Shin Sei Yariman Gakuen Enkou Nikki The Animation]

titles.title: Core Mix Megamori: Okazu Desu yo
コアMIX メガ盛り オカズですよ
